name: Defend the Rock
description:
Your ship is broken! Your ship's engine is out of control! And things sometimes work? Survive as long as possible when your weapons and engine only work some of the time!

Try to destroy as many UFOs as possible while fighting with your ship's controls. Change your strategy as your options available to you are constantly changing.

Sometimes you go fast, sometimes you go slow. When your turbo is online, dash to create a wall of flames!

Weapons will activate and deactivate throughout your run. Don't rely too much on your current equipment - it could be changed out at anytime!

SimpleJust a regular cannon, nothing special
ShotgunA powerful blast that will push you back from the recoil
NapalmConjure fire under your mouse. It damages you and your enemies. Be careful!
